sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"健康的，强健的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: healthy, sound, robust, well, strong, vigorous, sturdy, tough, wholesome, fit
means: healthy ： 指身体无病，也可指身心健全、正常的。
sound ： 侧重身体各部分或器官没有病，无任何缺陷，即健康。
well ： 仅指没有疾病，但不一定很健康。
strong ： 既指体格健壮，又指体力或精神上的力量。
vigorous ： 指人强健有力，精力充沛。
sturdy ： 侧重于结实的体格。
tough ： 着重指人的体格健壮。
wholesome ： 多指能给人留下身体健康、思想健全或品德良好等印象。
fit ： 既可指健壮又可指健全无病。

word_mean: 粗程序：统计学中一个稍欠精确的术语，用于指对违背一种建立在其基础上的假设相对不敏感的程序，或用于指建立在疲软(较易令人信服的)假设基础上的程序，例如非参数试验

sentence.Network_en: The Neanderthals were very robust and quite different from us.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼安德特时期的人非常强壮，和我们迥然不同。

sentence.Network_en: He replied in characteristically robust style.
sentence.Network_cn: 像以往一样，他的回答铿锵有力。

sentence.Network_en: She was almost 90, but still very robust.
sentence.Network_cn: 她将近90岁了，但身体仍然十分强健。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Liran - 博客园 ... revoke 撤销 robust 健壮 robustness 健壮性.
“稳健（robust）一词对很多美国人来说，听起来很奇怪。许多统计学术语都来自于英国的统计学家，并且都反映了他们的语言习惯。 …
进化是最鲁棒(robust)的，但不见得是最智慧的；这和民主与专制之间的权衡非常类似。可以说，无论对进化还是对神，我们都有不少 …
一段情两颗❤ 三个字 。 ... 259. rip v. 撕裂 261. robust a. 健壮的 263. safeguard v. 保护.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin robustus 'firm and hard', from robus, earlier form of robur 'oak, strength'

encyclopedia.content: 一、原意： robust英音：[rəu'bʌst]美音：[rə'bʌst] 形容词a. 1.强健的；茁壮的；健全的 The once robusteconomy now lies in ruins. 这一度十分健全的经济现已崩溃。 2.结实的，坚固耐用的 3.需要很强体力的 4.锛埦骑級醇厚的；锛埼讹級浓的 5.粗鲁的；粗野的；喧闹的 二、引申译为：鲁棒性 在一些科技文献中常用来表示对外界环境的不受干扰性，图像处理、信号处理等领域经常会遇到robust这

entry.tran: 强健的;健壮的;坚固的;结实的
entry.def: Someone or something that is robust is very strong or healthy.

example.ex: More women than men go to the doctor. Perhaps men are more robust or worry less?...
example.tran: 看医生的女性多于男性。也许男性更强壮或者顾虑要少一些？

example.ex: We've always specialised in making very robust, simply designed machinery.
example.tran: 我们一直专注于制造极为结实耐用而且设计简单的机器。

entry.tran: (观点等)强烈的，坚定的，坚决的
entry.def: Robust views or opinions are strongly held and forcefully expressed.

example.ex: A British Foreign Office minister has made a robust defence of the agreement...
example.tran: 一位英国外交大臣坚决维护这个协议。

example.ex: He has the keen eye and robust approach needed.
example.tran: 他具备了所需的敏锐的洞察力和坚定的行事态度。

means.word_mean: 2. marked by richness and fullness of flavor;
3. strong enough to withstand intellectual challenge;

auth_sentence.content: 'Held robust views' meant he was a bigot.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'Held robust views' meant he was a bigot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'Held robust views' meant he was a bigot.

auth_sentence.content: Our response to these requests has generally been robust.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our response to these requests has generally been robust.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our response to these requests has generally been robust.

auth_sentence.content: We will be a very robust and resilient population.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will be a very robust and resilient population.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will be a very robust and resilient population.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 强健的,雄壮的,精力充沛的,坚固的,浓的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rob=robor力量+ust表形容词→adj.强健的,雄壮的,精力充沛的,坚固的,浓的
cor共同+robor力量+ate表动词→共同有力量→证实

sentences.en: That chair's not very robust;  don't sit on it.
sentences.cn: 那把椅子不太结实, 别坐它了。

jushi.english: Yoke was a robust young man.
jushi.chinese: 约克是一个强壮的年轻人。

jushi.english: At age 60,he is robust and plays golf every day.
jushi.chinese: 60岁时，他身体仍然强壮，每天打高尔夫球。

jushi.english: That chair's not very robust; don't sit on it.
jushi.chinese: 那把椅子不太结实，别坐它了。
